member.name: T:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly
member.summary: The DecodeAssembly is the entry point for the DecodeAssembly. This class exposes all decode functionality.

member.summary: Releases all of the DecodeAssemblies resources.

The key used to call the ScanMultipleBarcodes procedure.

member.summary: Code ID of last code read

member.summary: Both British Post and Royal mail

member.name: T:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting
member.summary: The DecodeSetting properties are used to set and retrieve misc. properties associated with scanning

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.SearchTimeLimit
member.summary: Number of msec the decoder is allowed to search an image for a possible barcode

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.DecodeAttemptlimit
member.summary: Number of msec the decoder is allowed to attempt to decode a possible barcode for a given image

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.ScanningLightsMode
member.summary: Used to select illumination and aimer settings use during a scan barcode apttempt 0 = No aimer or illumination during scanning 1 = Aimer only 7 = Illumination only 3 = Both illumination and aimer

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.LastImageSize
member.summary: Size of last captured image in bytes

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.ScanInProgress
member.summary: Used to determine if decode\scan attempt is already in progress 1 = decode\scan attempt in progress 0 = no decode\scan in progress

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.DecodeSetting.ReverseVideoEnable
member.summary: Used to enable reverse video, white barcodes printed on a black background 1 = Enable 0 = Disable Default = 0

member.name: T:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.Engine
member.summary: The Engine properties are used to retrieve details about the installed engine and to control the illumination and aimer LEDs when not scanning

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.Engine.Type
member.summary: Used to retrive installed engine type. 1 = Imager 2 = Laser

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.Engine.NumRows
member.summary: Number of rows in image engine

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.Engine.NumCols
member.summary: Number of columns in image engine

member.name: T:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.UnsupportedCodes
member.summary: LinearCode are properties used to set or get the symbology specific settings for linear\1D barcodes.

member.name: T:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes
member.summary: Possible Return Codes from PInvoke DecoderAPI.dll Function Calls

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.EngineBusy
member.summary: Scan engine is busy and could not respond to command

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.NoDecode
member.summary: Decode library could not decode a barcode.

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.NoImage
member.summary: System could not retrieve and image from the image engine.

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.NoResponse
member.summary: The scan engine di dnot respond to the command

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.NoTrigger
member.summary: The application reported the "trigger" state is false.

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.SmartImageTooLarge
member.summary: IQ image is too large to fit in memory allocated.

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.DecoderException
member.summary: An exception was detected in the decode library.

member.name: F:HSM.Embedded.Decoding.DecodeAssembly.ResultCodes.UnsupportdIQBarcode
member.summary: The barcode detected during the IQ image attempt is not a valid IQ host barcode.
